extras.standardSegment Module¶

Define X12.parse structures for some standard X12 Segments.

These are definitions of some standard Segments without a lot of supporting detail. This can be used (or extended) to cover cases where X12 segment metadata is not available.

This module includes a conversion to emit “better-than-nothing” X12.parse.Segment definitions for a few standard X12 Segments.

var isa:ISA Segment
var gs:GS Segment
var st:ST Segment
var se:SE Segment
var ge:GE Segment
var iea:IEA Segment
extras.standardSegment.buildSegment(name, desc, fieldText)¶

Convert a block of text to a Segment definition. The block of text has one Element defined on each line. The Element definition is an Element name, one or more spaces, and the element description.

Parameters:
  • name – the name of the segment
  • desc – the description of the segment
  • fieldText – a block of text, with one Element name and description per line.
Returns:

X12.parse.Segment definition
